spec_data.Name: libprojectM-qt
spec_data.Description:
projectM-qt is a GUI designed to enhance the projectM user and preset writer
experience.  It provides a way to browse, search, rate presets and setup
preset playlists for projectM-jack and projectM-pulseaudio.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 12:59:24 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: The Qt frontend to the projectM visualization plugin
